.. inclusion-marker-introduction-start

**************************************************************************
Introduction
**************************************************************************

`armine` is a Association rule mining package for python3. It provides `ARM` class
to generate association rules from a set of transactions. It also provides a
`ARMClassifier` class which uses CBA2 algorithm to classify given data.

.. inclusion-marker-introduction-end


.. inclusion-marker-install-start

**************************************************************************
Installation
**************************************************************************

::

    pip install armine


.. inclusion-marker-install-end

Introduction

armine is a Association rule mining package for python3. It provides ARM class to generate association rules from a set of transactions. It also provides a ARMClassifier class which uses CBA2 algorithm to classify given data.

Installation

pip install armine
